Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class SkillDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<SkillEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.SkillDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SkillDao extends AbstractDao<SkillEntity>
The SkillDao class is a Data Access Object (DAO) for the SkillEntity class. It provides methods to interact with the database.
